schema.description: oss文件地址：一个可以不用赋权就能访问的HTTP地址
翻译的证件类型：身份证(idcard)，驾驶证(driving_license)
翻译结果类型：文本（text），图片（image），不传值默认：text

Key.description: 证件内容标题，如身份证中的姓名，性别

400.errorMessage: Failed to translate the certificate. Please check the parameters.

403.errorMessage: The service has not been activated.

503.errorMessage: An error occurred while processing your request.

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "6640DE48-201C-4110-AE87-FB8FA34412B9",
  "Data": {
    "TranslatedValues": [
      {
        "KeyTranslation": "name",
        "Key": "姓名",
        "Value": "庄严",
        "ValueTranslation": "Solemn"
      }
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<TranslateCertificateResponse>
    <RequestId>BA8DAAE0-1985-4B19-86BA-97C1753FCF3A</RequestId>
    <Data>
        <TranslatedValues>
            <ValueTranslation>Huang Jia</ValueTranslation>
            <KeyTranslation>name</KeyTranslation>
            <Value>黄佳</Value>
            <Key>姓名</Key>
        </TranslatedValues>
        <TranslatedValues>
            <ValueTranslation>2019-07-05</ValueTranslation>
            <KeyTranslation>effective start date</KeyTranslation>
            <Value>2019-07-05</Value>
            <Key>有效起始日期</Key>
        </TranslatedValues>
        <TranslatedValues>
            <ValueTranslation>331021190</ValueTranslation>
            <KeyTranslation>certificate number</KeyTranslation>
            <Value>331021190</Value>
            <Key>证号</Key>
        </TranslatedValues>
        <TranslatedValues>
            <ValueTranslation>1999-11-04</ValueTranslation>
            <KeyTranslation>date of birth</KeyTranslation>
            <Value>1999-11-04</Value>
            <Key>出生日期</Key>
        </TranslatedValues>
        <TranslatedValues>
            <ValueTranslation>No. 3 Damaiyu Street, Yuhuan county, Zhejiang province</ValueTranslation>
            <KeyTranslation>address</KeyTranslation>
            <Value>浙江省玉环县大麦屿街道3号</Value>
            <Key>住址</Key>
        </TranslatedValues>
        <TranslatedValues>
            <ValueTranslation>Fujian Ningde, traffic police division, public security bureau</ValueTranslation>
            <KeyTranslation>license issuing unit</KeyTranslation>
            <Value>福建省宁德市公安局交通警察支队</Value>
            <Key>发证单位</Key>
        </TranslatedValues>
        <TranslatedValues>
            <ValueTranslation>Chinese</ValueTranslation>
            <KeyTranslation>nationality</KeyTranslation>
            <Value>中国</Value>
            <Key>国籍</Key>
        </TranslatedValues>
        <TranslatedValues>
            <ValueTranslation>2019-07-05</ValueTranslation>
            <KeyTranslation>date of first issue</KeyTranslation>
            <Value>2019-07-05</Value>
            <Key>初次领证日期</Key>
        </TranslatedValues>
        <TranslatedValues>
            <ValueTranslation>C1</ValueTranslation>
            <KeyTranslation>class</KeyTranslation>
            <Value>C1</Value>
            <Key>准驾车型</Key>
        </TranslatedValues>
        <TranslatedValues>
            <ValueTranslation>Women's</ValueTranslation>
            <KeyTranslation>sex</KeyTranslation>
            <Value>女</Value>
            <Key>性别</Key>
        </TranslatedValues>
        <TranslatedValues>
            <ValueTranslation>2019-07-05至2025-07-05</ValueTranslation>
            <KeyTranslation>validity period</KeyTranslation>
            <Value>2019-07-05至2025-07-05</Value>
            <Key>有效期限</Key>
        </TranslatedValues>
    </Data>
</TranslateCertificateResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 证件翻译
description:
请确保在使用该接口前，已充分了解图片翻译产品的[收费方式和价格](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/163332.html)。

该接口适用于**证件翻译**。 如需调用通用图片翻译和电商图片翻译，请参考[图片翻译调用指南](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/2505940.html)。



**图片限制**
文件大小限制：4M
支持的格式：jpg, jpeg, png

接口QPS限制：40

> 仅支持通过POST方式调用
